bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names sun tai 損胎 , injured fetus; sun dong tai qi 損 動胎氣 , injured fetus qi; ren shen shang dong 妊娠傷動 , injury inflicted during pregnancy; ren shen dong tai 妊娠動胎 , fetus stirred during pregnancy. Pathological Condition Combined Designation of harm or injuries inflicted upon a fetus because of one of the following causes: an illness or excessive exhaustion of the mother during pregnancy, or immoderate sexual intercourse. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 2 ：治妊娠傷胎，結血心腹痛 , “It cures fetal harm inflicted during pregnancy, with bound blood and abdominal pain”.
